div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvjo die
maij anno Dominj quo supra

The saide day Jonhne fechat was in ane Amerciament of the court be his
avne tunge gravnt for the brekin of common ordinance in selling
of beir' for iiij d' the quartar' and to amend' as law will and forber'
In tym to cum And' the aldirman and balyeis chargit the saide Johne
that he suld' sell nay beir' derrar thane iij d' the quart In tyme
to Cum vndir the pane of the Strikin out of the barrellis hedis

Curia balliuorum de Aberdenne tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo die mensis maij Anno quo supra

The said day the ballies assignit this day xv dais the thride
day of Junij tile androw stevinsone tile ansuer to the borgh' strekit
one him be androw stratoun'

The said day androw stratoun' come law souerte be his hand vphaldin
for alexander gray younger that Rob alexandersone seriand tile alexander crag
salbe vnskathit of him vthirwais thane law will And Dauid blinsele
come souerte be his hand vphaldin that the said alexander salbe skathtles of
the said Rob alexandersone vthirwais than law wil And Ilkan of the said
persones at bundin to fre thar borrowis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiijo
die mensis maij Anno quo supra

the said' day It was fullely appontit and accordit betuix Jonet
strathathin / brothir douchtir tile vmquhile sere Jonhne Srathin
one ane part Ande patry gavane procurator to Jonet strathin
alias thomsone one that vthir part allegeand tham ayris to vmquhile
the saide sere Johne that thai sale Impetrat brevis of Inquest
of our Souerane lordis chapell one batht the partiis and caus' thame
to be proclamit to the tuentij day of the monetht of June nixt to
Cum Ande thai sale ocht propone nayn' excepcionis agan the saide breuis
and sale caus' thame to be put to the decisioun' of ane assis'
vnsuspect furthtwith but delay

The saide' day sere Alexander thomson' vicar of Strathathin deponit be his
aithe Is that Jonet strathin is Williame strathinis' douthir'
gottin in matrimonye quhilkis William was brothir german to sere
Johne Srathin and berne nerrast befor the saide sere Johne and borne
in the tone quher' he duelt et cetera
Thomas Cuthtbert concordis with the saide sere Alexanderis deposicioun et cetera

The said day the aldirman and balyeis with avis' of the court assignit
Widnisday the xxv day of maij Instant to thome lammynton'
to ansuer' perempturlie to Dauid Colp for the wranguis' Intrometting
of iiijC skinnis eftir the tenor of our' Souerane lordis lettres directit
to thame tharapon'

the said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit gilbert prestone to pas'
and warne sere Johne ruthirfurd' befor Sufficient witnes to comper befor
thame the xxtj day of June nixt to Cum to her' and se the land'
of vmquhill henry ruthirfurd' be diuidit eftir the tenor of the
breiwe of diuision' directit to tham tharapon' as ane of the parcionaris
of the saide lande and thai warnit and chargit James allirdes to be
at the said' day with his wif or' Sufficient pouer' of hir' as ane of
the parcionaris of the said' lande

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Robert
henrison' to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Johne steuinson'
for the wranguis Skathing of ane pak of wad' of his

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv
die maij quo supra

The saide day Sandy Donaldson' was in Ane amerciament of the court
be his avne tong gravnt for strubulance of Elspat bogy and the
said' elspat was conuict' be ane assis' William blinsele
forspekar for strublance of the said' Alexander et cetera And' gif ony of tham
strubulis vthir in tyme to cum and beis conuikit tharof sal pay xx s'
to Sanct nicholes werk et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die
maij Anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes michaelis commorans in odyell in Norvay concessit
se plenarie Solutum per nauis Johannis fechat de omnibus bonis
mensis et mensibus in nauj sua Infra portum Abirdensis portatis
eundum Johannem ac dictum burgum exinde quietclamauit Imperpetuum

Eodem die Willelmus Wricht fecit constituit et nominauit d magister
Andream Crafurde suum legittimum procuratorem in causa mota quod
eum penes conductioni cristine fraser Agendum prosequendum
et defendendum promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

The saide day Jonhne fechat complenyet to the aldirman
ande balyeis allegeand' that Jonhne of mar' the balye hed'
wranguis' outakin Intromettit and avay hed' ane barrell
of ber' out of his hous' that he hede in maling' and that
he hed' strubullit him and his wif beseking tham of
Remede of law quhilkis the saide Johne mar' denyit
and In continent the saide matir was put to the decisioun'
of ane assis'' with bath consent of batht the partiis of thir
personis Alexander Rede gilbert menyes William chamer thomas
Waus William portar Richerd' Waus patry Rede Johne Steuinson' William
andirson' Dauid blinsele Alexander myrton' James Strathin Johne
annand' William nicholsone and Androw meldrum quhilkis Riplie
avisit the Richtis Resonis and allegacionis of bath the partiis
herde sene and vndirstandin deliuerit and fand' ale in ane
voce concordand' the saide Jonhne mar' quyt of ale
the wrangwis' Intrometing of the saide barrell of ber'
and of ale strubulance of the saide Johne and of his wiff and
his hous'

head.add: dominus Andreas coupar et Alexnader chamer et

div.p:
The said day the aldirman and balyeis Assignit aucht merkis
of the malys of thar' vuirmyll to sere Androw Coupar for his fe for
this Instant yer' Ande Alexander chamer and Johne chamer his sone
Come Souerte to pay to sere Androw Coupar at the commavnd' of the
aldirman and the balyeis fyve li' of the Rude malys tharof
fiftj s' at lammes nixt to Cum and vthir fiftj s' at mertymes
in winter nixt thareftir and tene s' to the toune for his gude
seruice to be tane done for this Instant yer' Ande gif thai falye
In thankfull pament the tak of the Rude malys salbe
in the tovnis handis and at thar' disposicioun' .

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander
Red forspekar that Mag loremar sale pay to the wif of
Williame Chamer viij s' of siluer ande a cirtill half a
stane of wole a curche and a sark

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die maij anno quo supra

The saide day the actioun' debatabile betuix Jonhne blak and
Jonet litstar' with consent of batht the partiis is continevit to
this day xv dais in siclik forme as it is now In hoip of
Concorde

The saide day It was preuit be Williame talyour' and Eby
Waus that cristiane fraser feit hir with William Wricht
for this Instant yer' as day assignit to the said' William
to the saide preywe and bessy fentoune ordanit be her'
the said' day to hir the saide preiwe

The said' day the balyeis ordanit and chargit Jonhne
crukschank and Williame ranisone to Comper befor
tham one friday the thrid' day of June nixt to cum
to her' f It preuit that law borrouis is brokin be
the said' William Ranison' and Dauy ruthirfurd one
thome bege

The said' day vmfray Donaldsone in the weltone was in Ane
amerciament of the court be his avne tong gravnt for strubulance
of Jonhne Walcar' on the avay takin of the tovnis
of wod' and to Amend' as law will and forber' in tym
to Cum

The said' day Jonhne Cullan grantit him pait be William
serray litstar of iij li' for his keelhir' of Willekinnis schip
the tyme Scho come out of Danskin of the fraucht
of certane as' resauit be the said' William assignit to
the pament of the said' Johne be the Schipmen of the
said' Schip for the tyme

The said day gil Jonhne patirsone in his wifis nayme
was conuikit be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyes forspekar
for the brokin' of commone ordinance in Selling of ber' for iiij d'
the quart for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court and to
amend' as law will and forber' in tym to Cum

The said' day gordon' Walcar was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' gilbert
menyes forspekar for the strubulance of Jok abirdouris seruand' to William Wormet et cetera

The said' day Johne Cuk at the chapele of Stanewod' was conuict'
be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyes forspekar for the strubulance of
Duncan craik in the avay takin fra him of certan birkis out of
the landis pertening to the said' burghe and hevin out of the
wod' of the said' burghe and to Amend as law wil and forber'
in tym' to Cum

The said' day Johne Cuk was conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
gilbert menyes for strubulance of Adam Rossall in the avay takin
and Resisting of him of certan birkis out of the landis and wode of
the said' burghe for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the court et cetera
and to Amend as law will and forber' in tym' to Cum

The saide day Johne Cuk was conuict' be the saide assis' for the strubulance
of thome gray for the resisting and avay takin of him of certane birkis
out of the landis and wode of the said' burghe et cetera

The saide day Johne Cuk was conuict' be the saide assis' for the strubulance
of Robert burray for the avay takin and resisting of certan birkis fra
him out of the landis and wode pertening to the said' burgh

The saide day Wat Wischeart was conuict' be the said' assis' gilbert
menyes forspekar for the Selling of ber' with ane vnrichtuis' poynt and
to Amende as law will and forber' in tym' to Cum

The said day Robert hendsone tuk to preive one friday that nixt
cumis with Williame chamer Dauid fynne and androw meldrum that he
had nocht skathit Johne stevinson in the spilling of a pak of
wald' quhilk come hame in mawnis schip
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die Junij anno quo supra

the said' day the aldirman and balyeis chargit W and ordanit Johne leslie
of warderis to Comper befor thame on monunday the sext day of this
Instant monetht of June to ansuer to Agnes prat and katherin prat
Anent the gudis of airschip clamit be thame be deces' of vmquhile
thomas prat thar fadir gevin In In writ Ande discernit the copy of the
saide writ to the saide Johne

The saide day Richerd bernys grantit him avande to Androw steuinsone
x s' and ix d' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday the sext
day of this Instant monetht of June to Williame serray litstar
to Ansuer' perempturlie to the borghe' fundin one him be William
Cheishame that he aw to Releywe him of the fraucht of thre
lastis of As' quhilkis his gudis was compellit for and pait for
him

The saide day Comperit Dauy Ruthirfurd' and offerit him Redy
to freithe Johne Crukschank his borghe and to ansuer' tile ony
party that Is planteous' one him protestande that his borghe
be nocht trubulit nor Inquiet quhile he be new warnit

the saide day It was Sufficientlie preuit and thareftir the Court wardit
schew for law and It was gevin for dome that William loremar'
was tennent to the lande of Riche pyot Selt to him be Johne
pyt fadir and tutor to the saide Riche and thome pyot his gravntsir

head.add: Johne Duncanson' the priouris of Abirdene and banff

div.p:
The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Williame
blinsele forspekar that Johne Duncanson' Is quyt of ale strubulance hurting
and Skathing of ane brovne hors' takin in his corne pertening'
to the prior of banff

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday the
Sext day of June Instant to Thomas leslie to preyve the
vaile of the govne that Wat Safray Intromettit with pertening
of airschip to Androw Wobstar ayr' to vmquhill Alexander Wilson'
quhilkis govne the said' Walter grantit to deliuer and becaus' It was
alterit and maid' in ane womannis govne and worne the said thomas
refusit to Ressaue It and Askit the price of It
